(c)2015 the Las Vegas Sun (Las Vegas, Nev.) 08/18/2015 - 12:00 pm | View Link How And Why A Las Vegas Sands/Wynn Resorts Merger Could Be The All Time Blockbuster In The Gaming Space We've reviewed the weather reports and what follows is our take on the most logical, no-brainer deal in the casino space: Merge Wynn Resorts (NASDAQ:WYNN) and Las Vegas Sands (NYSE:LVS) into a holding company with Steve Wynn and Sheldon Adelson as Co-Chairmen.
